ul.li: Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where constraint = ((< 763158003 |Medicinal product (product)|) . 127489000 |Has active ingredient (attribute)|) or ((< 763158003 |Medicinal product (product)|) . 762949000 |Has precise active ingredient (attribute)|)

description.value: Le jeu de valeurs à utiliser pour coder l'élément *ingredient.itemCodeableConcept* des ressources *FrMedicationUcd*, *FrMedicationUcdPart* et *FrMedicationNonproprietaryName*.

value.value: ((< 763158003 |Medicinal product (product)|) . 127489000 |Has active ingredient (attribute)|) or ((< 763158003 |Medicinal product (product)|) . 762949000 |Has precise active ingredient (attribute)|)
